doc.title: Duck Heart Teslacoil
doc.plot: Duck, a timid kindergarten student, has a big problem. His bus stop rival, Monster, has a nasty habit of lighting Duck's head on fire... repeatedly. But Duck's luck changes when he finds a lost Tesla coil alongside the road. When Monster approaches the next day, Duck arms the weapon and awaits the sweet taste of revenge. But as the Tesla coil discharges, it misses Monster and hit a nearby school bus instead. Monster's gleeful reaction to the explosion leads Duck to realize what Monster likes most: fire. The following day Duck demonstrates a more agreeable way for Monster to enjoy pyrotechnics using sparklers. Monster thanks his new best friend with a big hug.
